dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 316 x 82 cm (10 ft. 4 7/16 in. x 32 5/16 in.)
Repeat H: 48 cm (18 7/8 in.)
title: Textile
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
description: Four scenes, captioned in French, relating the four seasons to the four ages of man; infancy, youth, middle age and old age. The scenes are in a lattice of flowers. in yellow ocher on white.
name: Textile
